sources.title: The Magnificent Rogue (1946) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Lynne Roberts, Warren Douglas, Gerald Mohr
Director: Albert S. Rogell
Cinematography: John Alton

While her husband is away fighting during WWII, a young wife successfully manages his advertising business. A snag develops when the husband returns and expects her to be a housewife.

metadata.Plot: A attractive young wife steps in and manages her husband's advertising business when he is called to war. In order to win an important new contract, the wife allows the handsome potential client to think she is still single. Things get complicated when the client is stranded at the family home on a stormy night.
metadata.Writer: Dane Lussier, Sherman L. Lowe, Gerald Drayson Adams
metadata.Actors: Lynne Roberts, Warren Douglas, Gerald Mohr
